definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: He said that the current Russia-China economic and trade relations enjoy a sound momentum of development.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，當前俄中兩國經貿關係呈現良好發展勢頭。

sentences.english: The two countries are becoming increasingly interdependent and are closely connected with each other in their future development.
sentences.chinese: 俄中相互依存日益緊密，發展前途密切相關。

sentences.english: The Russian-Chinese declaration also touched on nuclear non-proliferation, saying that these issues must be addressed using political and diplomatic methods.
sentences.chinese: 同時，俄中的聲明中還涉及到防止核武器擴散的內容。

sentences.english: Prime Minister Fradkov pointed out that the trade between Russia and China has witnessed rapid development and fruitful achievements.
sentences.chinese: 弗拉德科夫表示，俄中貿易發展迅速，富有成效。

sentences.english: In international affairs Russia and China have conducted effective coordination and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 在國際事務中，俄中進行了有效的協調和合作。

sentences.english: Sechin spoke highly of the achievements of Russia-China energy cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 謝欽高度評價俄中能源合作取得的成績。

definition: Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Primorsky Krai (Russian territory whose administrative center is Vladivostok 符拉迪沃斯托克)
Lavrov (name)/Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (1950-), Russian diplomat and politician, Foreign minister from 2004

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Wen2 chuan2 Dian4 xun4 she4
Shang4 hai3 He2 zuo4 Zu3 zhi1
